TI: Spatial Cognition: Goal-Vector Cells in the Bat Hippocampus.
AB: A new study recording from the hippocampus of flying bats has revealed populations of neurons tuned to the egocentric direction of the goal, the distance to the goal or their conjunction during spatial navigation.
